meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring in multiple regions.
meanings.sent1: The multiregional conference attracted attendees from various areas.
meanings.sent2: The multiregional trade agreement benefited multiple countries.
meanings.sent3: The multiregional weather forecast confused the meteorologists.
meanings.sent4: Her multiregional knowledge made her a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent5: The multiregional cuisine festival showcased dishes from around the world.

meanings.definition: Involving or affecting more than one region.
meanings.sent1: The multiregional conflict had global implications.
meanings.sent2: The multiregional pandemic required coordinated efforts from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The multiregional traffic jam caused delays for commuters.
meanings.sent4: His multiregional business strategy expanded market reach.
meanings.sent5: The multiregional wildlife conservation project aimed to protect diverse habitats.
